COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x154
STRING: When I woke up, I was surprised that I no longer felt
tired.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a
STRING: I felt this refreshed because I had a nap yesterday as
well, which made me worry for a moment about Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180
STRING: Realizing that it wasn't necessary to worry about her, I
grimaced and then checked what time it was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x196
STRING: [Chris] “9:40 in the morning...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac
STRING: I thought I still had time, as Phorni hadn't come to wake
me...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c2
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d8
STRING: I called her name, but there was no response.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e4
STRING: I started thinking about silly things like whether fairies
could oversleep or not, but I realized I didn't have time
for this kind of thing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fa
STRING: I quickly got ready and headed out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x206
STRING: [Chris] “I'm heading out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25e
STRING: I didn't even need ten minutes to get ready, so I was
able to make it to school without running too much.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x274
STRING: I couldn't leisurely take my time either, but I only
needed to walk a little quicker than usual.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ea
STRING: [Chris] “Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x324
STRING: [Fal] “Morning, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33a
STRING: We greeted each other, and then started on our
individual preparations.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x346
STRING: I placed my score in front of my position at my Fortelle
and sat down, focusing my senses.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x378
STRING: [Fal] “Tomorrow's the big day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38e
STRING: [Chris] “Hm? Yeah, that's right. About the details...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c0
STRING: [Fal] “There's a lot written on the campus bulletin
board, but most of it doesn't apply to us. The whole of
tomorrow is going to be used solely for Fortelle
performances.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ea
STRING: I hadn't really thought about it until now, but the
Fortelle recitals were on Friday, and the recitals for
other courses were going to be held throughout the
following week.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x40a
STRING: I suppose Torta would be having her recital on one of
those days.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x420
STRING: There were just over 200 students in each year level,
but naturally some courses such as the poetry course
didn't have recitals.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x436
STRING: Furthermore, for every Fortelle player recital there was
one less vocal student performing on vocal course
recital days, so in actuality there would be around 30
pairs performing in one day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44c
STRING: We were able to partner up with people other than
those from the vocal course, but most people including
myself paired up with someone from school, so that's
how it worked out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x462
STRING: [Chris] “And, when do we perform?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x494
STRING: [Fal] “Huh? Your name was listed at the start of the
afternoon group, so I guess sometime after 1:30...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b4
STRING: [Chris] “I see. So we're first up in the afternoon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d2
STRING: [Fal] “You didn't check this yourself?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e8
STRING: [Chris] “I was too busy practicing... Can we just leave it
at that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51a
STRING: [Fal] “... Hmph.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x548
STRING: Anyway, the practice rooms are still open tomorrow
too, so let's meet at the same time, and practice a little
before we take on the recital.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x568
STRING: [Chris] “Roger that. So, what are we going to do today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x59a
STRING: [Fal] “Practice until we are satisfied.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b0
STRING: [Chris] “Just to confirm but...until which of us is
satisfied?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5e2
STRING: [Fal] “Until we are both satisfied, of course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f8
STRING: [Chris] “...Got it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x62a
STRING: [Fal] “Hehe... Well then, let's begin.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c6
STRING: We finished playing, and without sharing any feedback,
Fal then casually asked me a question.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x700
STRING: [Fal] “Do you want to keep practicing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x74a
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, we still have time. Let's go through one
more time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77c
STRING: [Fal] “Okay, sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d6
STRING: [Chris] “Phew... Nah, I think we've done enough today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ec
STRING: It seems that we had been rehearsing so intently that
we had lost track of how much time had passed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x802
STRING: Deciding that it would do no good to tire myself any
more before tomorrow, I removed my hands from the
keys of my Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x834
STRING: [Fal] “...You're probably right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84a
STRING: Our performance was shaping up well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x856
STRING: We practically made no more careless mistakes, and
our interpretation and tempo for the song was
completely balanced between the two of us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x888
STRING: [Fal] “...Let's call it a day, shall we?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x89e
STRING: Fal must have been tired by this point, as she spoke
with a weary look on her face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b4
STRING: [Chris] “Are you tired? You okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8e6
STRING: [Fal] “A little, yes. But, I'm okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8fc
STRING: Fal started packing up as she spoke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x908
STRING: It wouldn't be fair to make her be late, so I also started
preparing to head home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x914
STRING: We both finished packing up, and then I spoke to her
just before we left the practice rooms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x92a
STRING: [Chris] “Hey, why don't I walk you home today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x95c
STRING: [Fal] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x972
STRING: [Chris] “I was just a little worried about you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x990
STRING: [Fal] “Why were you worried?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a6
STRING: [Chris] “Aren't you a bit tired from having work and
rehearsals? Sure you're okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d8
STRING: [Fal] “Thanks... I am a bit tired. But before I go home,
there's somewhere I have to drop by first.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f8
STRING: [Chris] “...You're not going off to help someone with
something, are you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa2a
STRING: [Fal] “Never.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa58
STRING: Anyway, why don't you come over later?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa64
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? Don't you have somewhere you have to
drop by?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa82
STRING: [Fal] “Yes, but after that, I was hoping we could have a
chat for a bit.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa98
STRING: [Chris] “A chat?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaca
STRING: [Fal] “...About tomorrow, things like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf8
STRING: And things after that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb04
STRING: [Chris] “Th-That's a good idea. Of course, as long as you
don't mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb2c
STRING: [Fal] “Okay, here's the key to my place. Make yourself at
home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb42
STRING: [Chris] “...Are you sure?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb60
STRING: [Fal] “I trust you. But, just don't look around too much,
okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb80
STRING: [Chris] “I-I won't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbd2
STRING: Taking her key, Fal and I parted ways in the hallway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbde
STRING: It seemed that the place she had to drop by was
somewhere at school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbea
STRING: Hoping that she truly hadn't been asked to do
something for someone, I watched her leave and then
headed for her place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc1c
STRING: [Chris] “Well, here I am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc32
STRING: Speaking to no one in particular, I entered her
apartment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6e
STRING: It wasn't as if this was my first time to come here, but
doing so by myself made me feel kind of nervous.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc84
STRING: It's not everyday that you go into a girl's room by
yourself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc90
STRING: And, what was it that she wanted to talk about?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc9e
STRING: She said she wanted to talk about “things after that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcaa
STRING: Thinking about what that could mean made my heart
beat faster.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb8
STRING: Understanding full well that it would be rude to look
around her room, my eyes found themselves looking
here and there at the things around me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd8
STRING: [Chris] “Her place is still as bare as I thought it was.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcfe
STRING: My first impression was like that, too, and upon looking
around her room with no one else in it, I felt like that
impression just got stronger.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd14
STRING: I totally forgot about the atmosphere of her room when
she was close by, or when I could see her cooking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd36
STRING: Pondering these thoughts, I ended up wandering
around her room for no particular reason.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd4e
STRING: I probably should have just sat still and waited, but for
some reason I was feeling restless.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd6e
STRING: [Chris] “Hm? What's that...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd94
STRING: A messy pile of papers stood out in my field of vision.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda2
STRING: Purely out of interest, despite being fully aware it wasn't
a good thing to do, I took a peek.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc2
STRING: [Chris] “...Looks like some kind of notification.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xde8
STRING: After looking at them long enough to understand this
much, I realized that they weren't written in Fal's
handwriting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdfe
STRING: Quite frankly, the handwriting was far from being neat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe1e
STRING: [Chris] “I guess someone asked her to rewrite all of
this... Again, like they always do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe4e
STRING: Thinking that I might be able to help her a little with it
all, I picked up one of the papers and checked what it
was about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe64
STRING: After reading a little bit of it, I could tell that it was like
a thesis or some kind of homework submitted a long
time ago, summarizing the personal interpretations of a
certain part of music history.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe86
STRING: Once I read a little further, I realized something was
strange.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe94
STRING: There were musical symbols written here and there, but
the lettering was beautifully done, as if it were written
by a completely different person.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeaa
STRING: I felt like I had seen those musical symbols before, and I
felt like it wasn't long ago that I saw them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeca
STRING: [Chris] “...Is this Fal's handwriting?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef0
STRING: Only the symbols and words used in music were written
extremely well, the rest of them were shaky and
seemed as if they weren't even written by the same
person.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf06
STRING: Coming to sudden a realization, and knowing that I
shouldn't be doing this, I picked up another bundle of
papers.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf1c
STRING: There was nothing written on the first few pages, but
the pages after that were filled top to bottom with the
same words repeated over and over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf34
STRING: It was just like what I did when I was learning to read
and write as a child.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf4a
STRING: The same words and phrases were being practiced
repetitively, in carefully written clumsy handwriting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf6a
STRING: [Chris] “Is this...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf90
STRING: Was this truly Fal's handwriting?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf9e
STRING: But now that I thought about it, she mentioned when I
was helping her write out some documents that she
didn't like her handwriting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb4
STRING: I didn't think of it as any more than a joke at the time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc2
STRING: Did the shackles of being an orphan still have an
influence on her even now...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfda
STRING: The handwriting of the bundles of paper at the bottom
was painful to look at. But the closer to the top it got
the better the writing became, indicating that they were
perhaps more recent.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xffa
STRING: The writer had now reached a level that was still hard
to praise, as I had felt something was still off when I
saw it earlier.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1010
STRING: These had to have been written by Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1026
STRING: [Chris] “...She's really working hard on this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x104c
STRING: This was the only thing I could say right now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x105a
STRING: It wasn't simply because she was talented that she had
the capabilities that she had, or that people trusted her
to the extent that they did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1070
STRING: It was more like she had a slow start, and despite this
continued to make efforts to improve, and formed the
person she is today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1088
STRING: I returned the bundles of paper to where I found them,
and sat down again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1096
STRING: I wondered how I should express the feelings that had
welled up inside me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ac
STRING: Adorable may not have quite been the right word for it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b8
STRING: But I couldn't help thinking about whether there was
anything I could do for her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ce
STRING: What could I possibly do?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10dc
STRING: She spoke of how she wanted to become a professional
musician that night, when we stood on the empty
recital stage.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10f4
STRING: She said she wanted to make a living out of singing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1102
STRING: Right now, what was it that I could do for her?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1110
STRING: What I could do was go up on the stage with her
tomorrow, and give the best performance I could
possibly give.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1126
STRING: Nothing more, nothing less.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x115a
STRING: [Fal] “I'm home. Chris, are you there?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1170
STRING: [Chris] “...Yeah, I'm in here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1186
STRING: I didn't respond in a very big voice, so it seemed that
Fal didn't hear me, as she only noticed I was here after
she came inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ca
STRING: [Fal] “You're here, good. I'm back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e0
STRING: [Chris] “Welcome home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11f6
STRING: I turned about, and greeted her kindly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120a
STRING: [Fal] “Are you hungry? Shall I make something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1220
STRING: [Chris] “No, it's okay. You must be tired, anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1252
STRING: [Fal] “I'm asking whether you're hungry or not.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1268
STRING: [Chris] “...I am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1286
STRING: [Fal] “Good.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b4
STRING: Okay, it won't take too long.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c2
STRING: Gazing at her silhouette from behind, the lifeless room
suddenly felt like it was now alive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x130a
STRING: We enjoyed a pleasant meal, and sat around chatting
while having some warm drinks.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1320
STRING: Fal had changed out of her uniform, and was wearing
her room clothes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1336
STRING: However, I felt like Fal still hadn't broached the topic
that she had wanted to talk about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134c
STRING: And just when I was starting to feel that I was okay with
that, Fal turned around and gazed at the clock on her
wall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x137e
STRING: [Fal] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1394
STRING: Exhaling a deep breath, Fal slowly stood up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13aa
STRING: And then, she walked to the window and stared out
into the falling rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b6
STRING: Without turning away from the window, she asked me
something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13de
STRING: [Fal] “Tell me, Chris. What... Do you think of me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13f4
STRING: The question was so sudden that for a moment I didn't
know how to answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1400
STRING: But, I was sure that I could give her the answer that she
desired.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1432
STRING: [Fal] “Have you ever thought I am a horrible person?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1448
STRING: [Chris] “...Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x145e
STRING: Before I could give any kind of answer, she repeated her
question.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1474
STRING: [Chris] “...No, I've never thought of you in that way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a6
STRING: [Fal] “Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14bc
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ee
STRING: [Fal] “But, I really am being horrible.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1504
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1536
STRING: [Fal] “Is it hard to believe?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x154c
STRING: [Chris] “It is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x157e
STRING: [Fal] “I thought as much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1594
STRING: Saying only this, Fal removed her gaze from the
window, and looked straight at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15aa
STRING: [Chris] “What's going on? Why'd you suddenly start
saying these things...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15dc
STRING: [Fal] “It's nothing. Do you... Mind if I sit over there too?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f2
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1608
STRING: Again, suddenly and without warning she said this, and
came over to sit next to me without even waiting for an
answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1640
STRING: [Fal] “Hey, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1656
STRING: [Chris] “Y-Yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x166c
STRING: Her face was suddenly close to mine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1680
STRING: [Fal] “Do you love me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1696
STRING: ...She finally said it, the question that I had kind of been
expecting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ac
STRING: Deep down in my heart I had already decided what my
answer would be.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c2
STRING: All I had to do was actually put it into words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ce
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I do. I love you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ec
STRING: [Fal] “...Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x171a
STRING: Saying this, she closed her eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1726
STRING: I knew what I had to do.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1732
STRING: It wasn't as if it was my first time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x173e
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x174a
STRING: My lips were dry from the extreme nervousness I felt, so
I moistened them and then gently, I kissed her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1768
STRING: [Fal] “...Mmn.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x177e
STRING: Our lips only met for a brief moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178a
STRING: Between my shyness, and more so the adoration I had
for her, I almost couldn't help myself from hugging her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17a0
STRING: When I was thinking that this was actually the right time
to wrap my arms around her, she took the initiative and
hugged me first.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17d6
STRING: [Fal] “Kiss me again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ec
STRING: And, with her arms wrapped around me, our lips met
once more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x182e
STRING: [???] “Hey Fal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1844
STRING: I felt like I heard a voice somewhere...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x186a
STRING: [Asino] “...What the hell?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1880
STRING: [Chris] “...Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1896
STRING: Fal disentangled herself from me, and shifted her gaze
to the source of the voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c6
STRING: [Asino] “What the hell is this?!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18f8
STRING: [Fal] “Asino.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x190e
STRING: [Chris] “...Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1924
STRING: I also shifted my gaze to where Fal was looking, and
realized that it was Asino who was standing there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x193a
STRING: But, I didn't understand what he was saying, or why he
was even here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1950
STRING: Everything was beyond my comprehension, and all I
could do was sit there, stunned.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x196e
STRING: [Asino] “You said I'd understand everything when I got
here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x199c
STRING: This? This is what you meant!?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ce
STRING: [Fal] “I'm sorry, but yes, this is exactly what I meant.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ec
STRING: [Asino] “...Tell me what's going on here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a1e
STRING: [Fal] “What is there to explain? It's Chris that I love.
That's why I asked him to be my partner, not you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a50
STRING: [Fal] “I could have just used words, but I thought that it
would be easier to understand this way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a70
STRING: [Chris] “...Fal? What are you saying?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a86
STRING: What did she mean?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a92
STRING: My eyes darted between the two of them, but neither of
them even tried to look at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aa8
STRING: [Chris] “...Asino, what's this all about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac6
STRING: [Asino] “Shut up! Just shut it!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1af8
STRING: [Fal] “Could you please not raise your voice?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b26
STRING: I'm sorry, but I was just using you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b58
STRING: [Asino] “...Using me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b76
STRING: [Fal] “The only reason I got close to you is because I
wanted to know more about Chris. But I really am
thankful in that regard.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b9e
STRING: Fal reached out toward me, and gently caressed my
cheek.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bb4
STRING: The movement was almost seductive, and I felt a shiver
run through my body.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bc0
STRING: I distanced myself slightly from Fal, who was smiling,
and gently pushed her hand away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bd6
STRING: [Chris] “Fal...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c08
STRING: [Asino] “Why Chris? Why does everyone choose him,
even Ms. Cordell... Even you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c44
STRING: [Fal] “Surely everyone has their own individual reasons.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c76
STRING: [Asino] “I'm...!

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cb8
STRING: [Fal] “You're what?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cd6
STRING: [Asino] “I'm nobility, dammit! Are you saying that I'm
inferior to him?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d12
STRING: [Fal] “Didn't I tell you I hated that kind of thinking?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d44
STRING: [Asino] “I'm... I'm different! I'm not like the others!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d76
STRING: [Fal] “Hehe... Ha-ha... Aha-ha-ha!

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da4
STRING: And what makes you so different? Can you even tell me
why you're different? Did you hear that, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1de0
STRING: [Fal] “Nobility or not, in the end he's just saying that
he's better than you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e00
STRING: [Chris] “Wait a minute! Please...could someone just
explain what's going on? Please...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e3c
STRING: [Asino] “No! I never said anything like that!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e6e
STRING: [Fal] “Oh? How strange. I'm quite sure that's what you
said just a moment ago.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e96
STRING: [Asino] “No, that's not... Why? Why Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ec8
STRING: [Fal] “You were just trying to use him too, right? You
said it yourself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ee8
STRING: Use me...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1efc
STRING: [Asino] “No... Chris and I were friends... No, we are
friends, I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f38
STRING: [Fal] “Didn't you say to me that you kept him as a friend
because he was useful to you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f60
STRING: [Asino] “That was...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f7e
STRING: [Fal] “Not what you meant?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fb0
STRING: [Fal] “Aha-ha! If you were going to do this world-weary,
lovable cynic routine,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fe8
STRING: perhaps you just shouldn't have done any of this in the
first place.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ffc
STRING: [Asino] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x201a
STRING: [Fal] “The reason you're so pathetic is because that's
the only way you can maintain your cheap pride.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x203a
STRING: The look on Asino's face...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2046
STRING: ...Was like that of a hurt child

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2052
STRING: I slumped against the wall, the strength gone from my
body.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x205e
STRING: I couldn't say anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x206a
STRING: Was this all just an act?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2076
STRING: If I screamed, would they start laughing and tell me it
was just a joke?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x208c
STRING: [Chris] “You two... This is just a joke, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20be
STRING: [Fal] “I'm sorry Chris, this is the truth. All of it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20de
STRING: [Chris] “No, that's a lie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2110
STRING: [Fal] “Chris, now you know that this so-called friend of
yours is a horrible person. Aren't you happy that you
discovered the truth?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x214c
STRING: [Asino] “No...!

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x217a
STRING: Chris, I... It's not like that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2186
STRING: [Chris] “Could someone please just explain...? Asino?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x219c
STRING: I stood up, and walked toward Asino.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a8
STRING: He flinched, seeming almost afraid, and then looked
right at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21bc
STRING: [Asino] “I didn't mean to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21d2
STRING: [Chris] “No, that's not what I want to hear! This is a
joke, right? You and Fal are just playing a prank on me,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21f2
STRING: [Asino] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2208
STRING: Asino didn't say anything, and just shook his head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2222
STRING: [Chris] “Why would you two pull such an elaborate
prank? Fal...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x225e
STRING: [Fal] “Like I said, this is not a joke. You need to
understand Chris, all of this is true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2286
STRING: [Fal] “You probably don't want to believe it, but I'm a
horrible person, and so is Asino. Plain and simple.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22a6
STRING: Fal admonished me as if she was just telling me about
the ways of the world.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22bc
STRING: The way she spoke was strangely kind, which in turn
made me feel repulsed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22c8
STRING: And as much as I didn't want to believe, I was starting
to see that it was all true.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22de
STRING: A few moments ago, I could never have imagined I
would feel anything like this toward her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22f4
STRING: I had just kissed her, held her... Told her I loved her...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x230a
STRING: But now, she seemed almost like a completely different
person to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2320
STRING: [Chris] “...You were deceiving me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2352
STRING: [Fal] “That's right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2368
STRING: [Chris] “...And Asino too?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x239a
STRING: [Fal] “Yes. I used him. He proved most useful too, but it
seems he got the wrong idea at some point.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23cc
STRING: [Fal] “If only he had known when to walk away, we
could have all been good friends.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23ec
STRING: [Chris] “Fal, stop it! Why are you saying these things? I
don't understand!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2428
STRING: [Fal] “I told you earlier, I'm a horrible person.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2454
STRING: As I was about to respond, I heard the sound of
something dragging along the wall behind me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x246c
STRING: Asino was using the wall to support himself as he stood
up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24a0
STRING: [Asino] “I'm...leaving.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24b6
STRING: [Chris] “Wait! Asino! We're not finished here!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24e8
STRING: [Asino] “Stay away!

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2516
STRING: Just leave me alone, please... I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x252c
STRING: [Chris] “What do you mean you're sorry?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x254a
STRING: [Asino] “It's just as she says... I was using you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2560
STRING: [Chris] “I don't care about that! You were being used
too, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2588
STRING: [Asino] “I care, Chris. And I'm really sorry... So please
just leave me alone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25a8
STRING: [Chris] “Asino...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25c6
STRING: [Asino] “Thanks for what you just said though..”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25ea
STRING: Then just like that, Asino left, quietly closing the door
on his way out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2600
STRING: [Chris] “...What is going on?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2616
STRING: My body almost felt numb.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2622
STRING: It all happened so suddenly, and everything was falling
apart-

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x262e
STRING: I could barely breathe as I sat there being tortured by
the endless questions that filled my mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2644
STRING: And, if I could just turn around, a lot of answers to my
questions would be right in front of me, but I was
unable to do so.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2670
STRING: [Fal] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2686
STRING: From behind me, she called my name in a gentle voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2692
STRING: I gathered what little strength was left in my body, and
forced myself to turn around and face her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26c6
STRING: [Fal] “I'm sorry this had to happen so suddenly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26dc
STRING: [Chris] “Why? Why did you do all of this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x270e
STRING: [Fal] “It's just as Asino said. I approached him and used
him, so that I could get closer to you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x272e
STRING: [Chris] “Why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2760
STRING: [Fal] “Because I was in love with you, of course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2776
STRING: [Chris] “You're lying.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27a8
STRING: [Fal] “That is the truth. That's why I looked into you, and
that's why we're here now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27c8
STRING: [Chris] “What do you mean, looked into me? Why did
you even have to do that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2804
STRING: [Fal] “Because that was the only approach I could think
of.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x281a
STRING: [Chris] “...You're lying. If that were the case, why would
you tell me like this? You could have just kept quiet. I
can't tell what's true and what's not anymore!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x284c
STRING: [Fal] “I've said nothing but the truth. I just wanted you
to see the true me...what I am really like.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x286c
STRING: [Chris] “And the true you is this horrible person? You
could have just told me! There was no reason for you to
hurt Asino like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28a8
STRING: [Fal] “I did use words, you just didn't hear them.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28be
STRING: [Chris] “How did you expect me to believe something
like that...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28d4
STRING: She was...so diligent...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28e0
STRING: Gentle, dedicated...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28ec
STRING: And...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2914
STRING: [Fal] “See? That's exactly why I needed to do something
to make you understand.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2934
STRING: [Chris] “...There was no need to do any of this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2966
STRING: [Fal] “There was for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2994
STRING: Hey... What do you think of me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29a0
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29d2
STRING: [Fal] “I wanted you to know who I am. That I'm a person
who can do such horrible things.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29f2
STRING: [Chris] “But why...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a24
STRING: [Fal] “Because I wanted you to say you loved me,
despite it all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a3a
STRING: ...Was that how she really felt?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a46
STRING: Even if that really was what she felt, I didn't have the
confidence to say that I still had those feelings for her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a5c
STRING: It was all too...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a68
STRING: It was all too hard to believe, and there was a part of
me that was still praying that this was all just some kind
of joke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a7e
STRING: There was still time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a8a
STRING: If she would just laugh and say it was all a big joke,
everything would resolve itself and it would be okay.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2aa0
STRING: [Chris] “...Do you mind if I ask you one more time?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2abe
STRING: [Fal] “Go ahead.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ad4
STRING: [Chris] “This is just a joke or something, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b06
STRING: [Fal] “This is the truth. I'm sorry my answer isn't what
you were hoping to hear.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b1c
STRING: [Chris] “Why... Why me? If all this is true, then you must
have been lying when you said you loved me, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b58
STRING: [Fal] “I do love you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b6e
STRING: [Chris] “...Why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b8c
STRING: [Fal] “The way you play the Fortelle.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ba2
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bd4
STRING: [Fal] “The sound of how you play the Fortelle has
something beautiful that no one else has. Something
that no one can imitate or re-create.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c1a
STRING: [Fal] “From the very first time I heard you play, I knew
you were the one. With you, I could aim for the top.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c56
STRING: [Fal] “With you, I could make my dreams come true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c6c
STRING: [Chris] “...So in the end, you were just using me, too?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c9e
STRING: [Fal] “I suppose so. That's also the truth.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cb4
STRING: She admitted it as if it were nothing, and kept going on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cdc
STRING: [Fal] “But isn't it natural for someone to use someone to
gain something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d18
STRING: [Fal] “The only reason that I go to this school is because
the person who found me wanted to use me, and I
chose to go along with it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d54
STRING: [Fal] “By doing so, my tuition was waived, and I was
able to find a cheap place to live. I also got the chance
to learn how to sing. And now, I can use everything I
have gained to move up in the music world.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d9a
STRING: [Fal] “And through that, the status of the person who
recommended me also improves. It's a win-win
situation, is it not?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dba
STRING: [Chris] “...That's just not right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dec
STRING: [Fal] “Which part?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e02
STRING: [Chris] “The whole thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e34
STRING: [Fal] “But, that's how I've lived my life this far, and that's
how I intend to continue.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e6c
STRING: And to do that, I need you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e82
STRING: [Chris] “...If that's the case, you chose the wrong way of
going about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2eb4
STRING: [Fal] “Yes, I think so too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2eca
STRING: She shook her head in reflection, and admitted it
honestly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ee0
STRING: [Chris] “...Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f12
STRING: [Fal] “Didn't I tell you earlier? That I wanted to hear you
say you loved me, despite all this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f32
STRING: Her expression was determined.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f3e
STRING: If I only I could read what was in people's minds...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f4a
STRING: I was almost ready to believe her, which is what made
me think such a thing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f60
STRING: ...No, I had practically already started to believe her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f6c
STRING: If she was planning to lie about that too, she wouldn't
have needed to call Asino here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f82
STRING: The moment I came to this realization, my heart started
to hurt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f8e
STRING: All that just for this?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f9a
STRING: And what about Asino?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fa6
STRING: No, I suppose to Fal it was more than “just for this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fd8
STRING: [Fal] “That's why I'm telling you the truth like this,
because I want you to know what kind of person I am,
and I want us to be together in spite of that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x301e
STRING: [Fal] “I'll ask one more time Chris... Will you stay with
me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x303e
STRING: Fal slid over next to me, her face close to mine like
before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3076
STRING: [Fal] “Chris, do you love me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x308c
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30a2
STRING: I couldn't answer her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30ae
STRING: Even though it was the exact same question she asked
me earlier.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30c2
STRING: [Fal] “Then, have your feelings for me changed?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30d8
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30ee
STRING: Again, I answered her only with silence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30fa
STRING: I still needed time just to understand what was going
on. There was no way I could process my feelings just
yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3126
STRING: [Fal] “Not going to answer, I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x313c
STRING: [Chris] “...I don't like being used.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x315a
STRING: [Fal] “Then, you should just use me, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3170
STRING: [Chris] “...I don't have any desire to use you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x318e
STRING: [Fal] “Really? Not at all?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31a4
STRING: [Chris] “No.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31c2
STRING: [Fal] “You said you loved me just before, didn't you?
Those feelings have completely disappeared now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31e2
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3200
STRING: [Fal] “...Hehe, I guess there's still hope if you're having a
hard time answering.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3258
STRING: Saying this, she removed the outer layer she was
wearing, right in front of me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3264
STRING: She was only wearing a shirt made of very thin material,
and her now revealed skin was etched into my mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x327a
STRING: I looked away immediately.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3286
STRING: [Chris] “...Stop this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32a4
STRING: [Fal] “I won't...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32ba
STRING: She moved even closer, and whispered in my ear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32ce
STRING: [Fal] “Why don't you just use me? I said that I love you,
and until a moment ago you said that about me too, did
you not?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32f8
STRING: [Chris] “Shut up! I don't want to be used...and I don't
want to use you, either!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3320
STRING: [Fal] “...Everyone does it, don't you know? I do it, you
do it...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3336
STRING: Her arm slithered around my shoulder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3374
STRING: [Chris] “Shut up!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x338a
STRING: I let my anger take over, and slapped away her arm.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x339e
STRING: [Fal] “Ahh!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33cc
STRING: [Chris] “Oh...! I'm sorry!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33e2
STRING: I apologized by reflex, but stopped immediately and
looked away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33ee
STRING: The bed creaked a number of times, and soon the
sound died down.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3404
STRING: My heart was pumping, and my ears hurt despite the
silence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3410
STRING: After becoming attuned to the silence, I started to hear
the sound of her breathing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3426
STRING: She was in the corner of my eye, and I was unable to
push her out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x343c
STRING: She lay on the bed, simply staring into my eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3452
STRING: The look in her eyes seemed like it was pity and
disdain, and at the same time, a look that called for
help.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3470
STRING: [Fal] “...You really don't feel anything for me anymore?
I'm ready, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3486
STRING: Her voice sounded twisted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3492
STRING: Or perhaps it was simply the world that had become
twisted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x349e
STRING: I felt like nothing mattered anymore...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34aa
STRING: And then she spoke one last time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34be
STRING: [Fal] “And that's because...I'm in love with you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34de
STRING: [Chris] “You're mad!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3516
STRING: What happened after that...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3522
STRING: ...Was all a blur.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3530
STRING: I never imagined that I could ever feel such rage inside
me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3546
STRING: It wasn't pure rage really, but more like frustration, and
profound sadness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3552
STRING: I was almost in tears, and so was Fal, as I did as I
pleased with her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x356a
STRING: Despite my memory being foggy, there were
fragments... The sensation of her body, and her scent...
They were burned strongly into my memory.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35b0
STRING: [Fal] “Hey, can we talk a little?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35c6
STRING: I sat on the edge of her bed, lifelessly staring at the
floor.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35d2
STRING: I was unable to even nod in response to her words, and
simply sat in silence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35e6
STRING: [Fal] “In the end, people can't make it on their own. Not
me, not you. Doesn't everyone use each other?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3610
STRING: [Chris] “...You're wrong.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x362e
STRING: [Fal] “I'm just changing the way it's worded, but what
we're all doing is the same.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x364e
STRING: [Chris] “...I'm pretty sure most people don't see it the
way you do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x366c
STRING: [Fal] “Then, how do they see it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3682
STRING: [Chris] “As helping each other. People respect each
other, thank each other, and do things for each other
because they want to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36ac
STRING: The words I spoke were idealistic, and I wasn't even
sure if I believed them or not.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36c2
STRING: But they were the only words I had to counter Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36d6
STRING: [Fal] “Helping each other. you say? I say it's the same
thing. Besides, even I show respect to people. although
I can't say I've ever felt genuinely thankful toward
anyone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3700
STRING: I wondered if that was actually true...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x370c
STRING: If having relationships with people, no, if having
someone do someone for you is nothing other than
using them, then what Fal was saying was right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x373e
STRING: [Fal] “...I want to be happy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3754
STRING: She said these words in a murmur, unexpectedly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3768
STRING: [Fal] “I've lived my whole life singing. When I was a
child, I sang on the streets, and I survived off the money
people gave me for it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3790
STRING: [Fal] “Even when I no longer needed to sing to survive
after being put in an orphanage, I continued singing to
prove myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37b8
STRING: [Fal] “But, that doesn't mean that singing was just a
means to an end, it has always been my dream. I love
singing, and I can only imagine how happy I would be
to make it my life's work.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37ea
STRING: [Fal] “And I've spared no effort in order to achieve that.
Always practicing, always making an effort to avoid
conflict with people, always accepting people's
requests for help with a smile.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3814
STRING: ... I was aware of all these things.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3820
STRING: She was always strict on herself, and never showed
complacency.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3836
STRING: The dream she once told me of, the values she spoke of
now, all of these things might just be the truth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3854
STRING: [Fal] “All of this is so that I can live my life singing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x386a
STRING: [Chris] “...And you need me to do this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3888
STRING: [Fal] “That's right. I need you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x389e
STRING: I was still unable to give an answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38aa
STRING: My emotions that suddenly welled up had cooled off,
and because of that I had lost the will to make any
decisions at the moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38c0
STRING: Those emotions hadn't disappeared; they still lingered
deep inside me, simmering.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38de
STRING: [Fal] “Can I ask one thing of you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38f4
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3912
STRING: [Fal] “Could you find a way to still do your recital with
me tomorrow?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3928
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3946
STRING: [Fal] “My registration as your partner for the recital has
been finalized, so it's too late for me to perform on the
days allocated to the vocal course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3978
STRING: [Fal] “I would have some more flexibility if I weren't a
third year voice student, mind you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3998
STRING: [Chris] “Then, why did you do all of this now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39b6
STRING: [Fal] “...Your answer?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39cc
STRING: Fal repeated her question, without answering mine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39d8
STRING: [Chris] “...Alright. I promise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39f6
STRING: [Fal] “Thank you. Now, about the first question I asked
you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a0c
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a2a
STRING: [Fal] “You don't need to answer it yet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a40
STRING: [Chris] “Why is that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a5e
STRING: [Fal] “It seems like you're still unsure, and sometimes
giving an answer immediately isn't always the best
course of action. Why don't we talk about once the
recital is behind us?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a88
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay. We can do that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3aa6
STRING: [Fal] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ad6
STRING: [Chris] “...That's enough. Please, just don't say anymore.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3af4
STRING: [Fal] “...I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b1c
STRING: She picked up her clothes that had fallen to the floor,
and in the corner of my eye I could see she was getting
changed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b32
STRING: A few moments after she was clothed again, she said
one last thing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b84
STRING: [Fal] “Could you find a way to still do your recital with
me tomorrow?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b9a
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3bcc
STRING: [Fal] “My registration as your partner for the recital has
been finalized, so it's too late for me to perform on the
days allocated to the vocal course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c12
STRING: [Fal] “I would have some more flexibility if I weren't a
third year voice student, mind you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c32
STRING: [Chris] “...Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c48
STRING: Right now, that was the only response I could give.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c70
STRING: [Fal] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3caa
STRING: I walked home through the dark streets, thinking about
how much I wanted to just crawl into bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cc0
STRING: The rain had become heavier, and my body was cold.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ccc
STRING: I didn't have the energy to run, so I just walked home as
fast as my legs could carry me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d1a
STRING: [Chris] “I'm home...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d30
STRING: I called out those words as I always did when I get
home, but the answer I would usually get never came.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d46
STRING: The towel that would normally be waiting for me wasn't
there, so I ended up having to drag my cold body inside
to get one.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d5c
STRING: [Chris] “...Phorni?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d7a
STRING: It was only just after nine o'clock, which I felt was a little
early for Phorni to have already disappeared for the day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d90
STRING: I considered that it might not be so strange, but then I
realized that I hadn't seen Phorni at all since yesterday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3da6
STRING: Feeling uneasy, I did a quick search around my
apartment, and upon doing so I noticed a single piece
of paper on my desk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3dc6
STRING: And on it, was just one word-

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3de8
STRING: “Goodbye.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3df4
STRING: Written in messy handwriting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e02
STRING: And just dumped there right next to the note, was a
pen that would have been hard for her lift.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e22
STRING: [Chris] “...Umm, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e48
STRING: What did she want to say with such a curt, one word
message?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e5e
STRING: Dumbfounded, I almost felt apathetic, but then I
suddenly indulged the impulse to scrunch up the piece
of paper in my fist.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e76
STRING: My emotions rose and fell quickly, and I soon became
calm again, and looked at the piece of paper in my
hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e8e
STRING: And then, I carefully unfolded the piece of paper and
flattened it out, returning it to a state in which the
words could be read again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3eae
STRING: I took the piece of paper and opened up my drawer
that was filled with many letters from Arie, and gently
placed it inside.
